text: Do not hire a man who does your work for money, but him who does it for love of it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: A man is usually more careful of his money than he is of his principles.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: Money and success don't change people they merely amplify what is already there.
author: Will Smith

text: If you would know the value of money, go and try to borrow some.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: It is not the employer who pays the wages. Employers only handle the money. It is the customer who pays the wages.
author: Henry Ford
